text: David Koresh (born Vernon Wayne Howell; August 17, 1959 â€“ April 19, 1993) was the American leader of the Branch Davidians religious sect. The FBI said that Branch Davidian Steve Schneider shot and killed Koresh, then committed suicide, on April 19, 1993 at the cult's compound. He was responsible for the Waco siege. Koresh was born on August 17, 1959 in Houston, Texas to a 15-year- old single mother, Bonnie Sue Clark. In 1982 he joined the Branch Davidians. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:1993 deaths Category:American murder victims Category:Christian religious leaders Category:Murder-suicides in the United States Category:Murders by firearm in the United States Category:People from Houston Category:People from Waco, Texas Category:People with dyslexia
title: David Koresh
